cyclone.name: BILL
cyclone.current_location: about 155 miles SSE of Galveston, Texas
cyclone.trajectory: tracking northwest toward the central Texas coast, then forecast to move inland across south-central Texas and Oklahoma
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: Texas coast near Port O’Connor–High Island stretch

weather_observation.watch_coast: None in effect for the Great Lakes; tropical storm watch only along Texas coast is outside the Great Lakes region
weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical Storm Warning from Baffin Bay to High Island, Texas
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Texas coastline and immediately adjacent western Louisiana coast
